body.bibl: Nin, Manel. “Progresso Spirituale Ad Esperienza Di Dio in Alcuni Testi Monastici Siriaci.” In The Spirituality of Ancient Monasticism: Acts of the International Colloquium Held in Cracow-Tyniec 16-19th November 1994, edited by Marek Starowieyski, 105–33.
